title: Citizen test
description: this is a test to see if sujcet is in fact a citizen of Pippakistan

question 1.text: Do you think the people of pippakistan are brilliant?

question 2.text: Do you think supreem leader Pipkin Pippa will bring this country to greatness once more?

question 3.text: Would you die for our supreem leader Pipkin Pippa?
